page.title: 18MERSTHAM VILLAGE (2)
page.content:
and{MERSTHAM BAPTIST CHURCH.} There is also a small library, an old peoples home and a sports ground. At the junction of{BATTLEBRIDGE ROAD and {NUTFIELD ROAD}is{ALL SAINTS C of E {CHURCH}and next to it is{CANADA HALL}a general meeting room. In{MALSTONE {AVE.}there is{THE CHURCH OF THE {EPIPHANY,}Girl Guide and Brownies packs meet here.
In{BATTLEBRIDGE LANE}in North Merstham is{NEWTON HAZELL HALL}which is a Scout and Cub hall. In{FRENCHES ROAD}is{ {BATTLEBRIDGE BOYS CLUB}with it's own sports ground. In{ALBURY ROAD}a Playgroup meets in a small hall. Finally there are public houses at the corner of{BLETCHINGLY ROAD and {PORTLAND DRIVE}and opposite the Ultramar Petrol Station on the A23.
